name: ARSKViewDelegate
desc: Methods you can implement to mediate the automatic synchronization of SpriteKit content with an AR session.

items.name: func view(ARSKView, nodeFor: ARAnchor) -> SKNode?
items.desc: Asks the delegate to provide a SpriteKit node corresponding to a newly added anchor.

items.name: func view(ARSKView, didAdd: SKNode, for: ARAnchor)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a SpriteKit node corresponding to a new AR anchor has been added to the scene.

items.name: func view(ARSKView, willUpdate: SKNode, for: ARAnchor)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a SpriteKit node's properties will be updated to match the current state of its corresponding anchor.

items.name: func view(ARSKView, didUpdate: SKNode, for: ARAnchor)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a SpriteKit node's properties have been updated to match the current state of its corresponding anchor.

items.name: func view(ARSKView, didRemove: SKNode, for: ARAnchor)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the SpriteKit node corresponding to an AR anchor has been removed from the scene.
